sentences.sContent: One second of arc movement is one thirtieth of a millimetre.
sentences.sContent_eng: One second of arc movement is one thirtieth of a millimetre.
sentences.sCn: 一弧秒的移动是一毫米的三十分之一。

sentences.sContent: Thirty-three thousand people think that Thursday is their thirtieth birthday.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thirty-three thousand people think that Thursday is their thirtieth birthday.
sentences.sCn: 三万三千人认为星期四是他们的第三十个生日。

words.tran: 第十三的；十三分之一的
